name: POLE: Free Demo
description:
POLE: A hard and colorful platformer. WARNING: System anomaly detected; System health at 20%;
Transmission has been logged.


THE GAME:

- The normally 2D world has been changed to 3D.
- Play as Pole Man as he tries to change it back by finding the pixels.
- POLE jump to restore the world in this hard-as-nails platformer!


GAMEPLAY:

- 22 Levels.
- 2-12 Hours.
- Collectables.
- Food! (The Restaurant.)
- Hilarious Characters.
- Vent your frustration by raging with a rage button.
- AND MORE...!


WATCH THIS EPIC TRAILER:


FAQ:

Q: HOW DO I PLAY THIS GAAAAAAME!!!!
A: You use the POLE to pole jump off walls, floors, and ceilings.
For example:
Use the POLE Downwards to jump up from a floor
Use the POLE Upwards to launch down from a ceiling
Use the POLE Leftwards to jump right from a wall
Use the POLE Rightwards to jump left from a wall
Keep practicing, try new things, and you will succeed.

Q: What is the point of POLE?
A: It's... complicated...
Just kidding :P.
The point of the game is to collect all the Sprites and beat the levels.
But that's not the only thing, play the game, explore every part of the levels, and see...

Q: How difficult is POLE?
A: Play it and see ;).


YOU CAN TRY!
NEVER GIVE UP!


This is a free demo of POLE.

The Demo includes:
- Levels 1-3.
- The Restaurant.

Please buy the full game on Steam
(Currently Wishlistable) to continue your journey.
